s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR COOLING UNIT EXPANSION VALVE

s2.ptxt: Sufficiently apply compressor oil to 2 new O-rings and the fitting surface of the evaporator sub-assembly joint.
Install the 2 O-rings to the evaporator sub-assembly.
Install the rear cooling unit expansion valve to the evaporator sub-assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL AIR CONDITIONING TUBE AND ACCESSORY ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Sufficiently apply compressor oil to 2 new O-rings and the fitting surface of the air conditioning tube and accessory assembly joint.
Install the 2 O-rings to the air conditioning tube and accessory assembly.
Using a 4 mm socket hexagon wrench, install the air conditioning tube and accessory assembly to the evaporator with the 2 hexagon bolts.
Attach the 3 claws to install the cooling unit case (motor side).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR BLOWER MOTOR WITH FAN SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the rear blower motor with fan sub-assembly with the 3 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 2 COOLER UNIT DRAIN HOSE

s2.ptxt: Install the No. 2 cooler unit drain hose.
Install the blower (rear) resistor with the 2 screws.
